entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: Shadouuh/Anju-JS: AnjuJS is a lightweight and efficient library for password encryption. It allows you to create custom encryption systems with salt, preferences, and a security key. It offers fast, secure encryption that is easy to implement, ideal for developers looking for a flexible and high-performance solution for managing passwords.
entry.content: AnjuJS is a lightweight and efficient library for password encryption. It allows you to create custom encryption systems with salt, preferences, and a security key. It offers fast, secure encryption that is easy to implement, ideal for developers looking for a flexible and high-performance solution for managing passwords.

entry.title: bwlange/sym-pick: Sym-Pick is a lightweight and efficient VS Code extension that makes inserting Unicode symbols effortless. It provides a searchable list of symbols and emojis that can be inserted into your code with a single click.
